title: The CDC says masks for the vaccinated are optional. As COVID cases climb, some feel differently.
content:
1. The CDC says masks for the vaccinated are optional. As COVID cases climb, some feel differently.  USA TODAY
  2. Fauci: CDC looking at changing mask guidelines  Yahoo News
  3. Fauci says health officials considering mask guidance revision for vaccinated  The Guardian
  4. Fauci: 'We're going in the wrong direction' on Covid-19 cases  CNN
  5. Dr. Fauci says a third booster shot for COVID-19 'might likely happen' for people who are immunocompromised  Business Insider
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: CDCは、ワクチンを接種した人のマスクは任意であるとしています。COVIDの症例が増加するにつれ、異なる見解を持つ人も出てきました。
疾控中心说，接种疫苗的人可以选择戴口罩。随着COVID病例的攀升，一些人有不同的感受。
疾控中心說，接種疫苗的人可以選擇戴口罩。隨着COVID病例的攀升，一些人有不同的感受。
